content:
Hi all,
I am getting the error while publishing our IG using STU3 IG publisher jar file. Can anyone know how fix it? Capture24.PNG

Thank you

The issue is that the terminology server is down. I've tried restarting it, but there's a configuration or other issue that's preventing it from coming up. We're going to have to wait for Grahame to get it working when he wakes up in 5 or so hours. In the meantime, try using the -tx N/A option
